EmailTemplate.name: Auto-Responder for Platinum Support
EmailTemplate.subject: We'll Be In Touch Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting Yodle Platinum Support! We received your message and look forward to assisting you as soon as possible. For more urgent requests, please call us at (855) 888-7545.
Yodle Platinum Support (855) 888-7545 platinumsupport@yodle.com
